text: 27.9-10: Sek 11.12-13 naŋga, Jer 32.6-15Kamataharɨm kuyu mu, kuha Got ambahi kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara, Jeremaia ambami, 30 tɨmbahɨrɨs silva haŋandɨhin mɨŋamu. Tɨmbahɨrɨs kandɨha Israel hati kru kandɨhamaŋ mut mɨŋamɨŋarɨm yɨhɨramamu. Aru nɨma yaŋ ambami maña tɨmbahɨrɨs kandɨhañɨ, kru pɨrɨ sɨŋgɨ musa mɨŋandi hamarɨm pɨrɨvɨsa mut mɨŋamu, vami. Kamataharɨm kandɨ vana ha Jeremaia ambami maña kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ yɨvurahami.
